ch0136_40_platane/0101_0701_01_10:
Why hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It sure is
lively around here today!
ch0136_40_platane/0101_0701_02_10:
Why don’t we get out there and join the
excitement?
ch0136_40_platane/7101_0701_01_10:
It sure is exciting to see the town bustling with
energy.
ch0136_40_platane/7101_0701_02_10: Everyone’s got such joyful smiles on their faces.
ch0136_40_platane/7101_0701_03_10: It’s wonderful to share happiness like this!
ch0136_40_platane/7102_0701_01_10:
You know, the taste of coffee actually changes
with the seasons.
ch0136_40_platane/7102_0701_02_10:
Drinking a hot cup of coffee on a cold day warms
you up from the inside out! And that makes the
flavor special!
ch0136_40_platane/7103_0701_01_10:
I got a new outfit and had my hair done for a
party. What do you think?
ch0136_40_platane/7103_0701_02_10:
The best part about dressing up in something
special is how it boosts your mood!
ch0136_40_platane/7104_0701_01_10: Gogoat have a long history with humans.
ch0136_40_platane/7104_0701_02_10:
In fact, it’s been said that they’ve assisted people
with their work for 5,000 years!
ch0136_40_platane/7104_0701_03_10:
Gogoat really give us their all, so I hope there’s a
way us humans can repay their kindness!
ch0136_40_platane/7105_0701_01_10:
Diving into a new subject that you’re not usually
interested in can be really fascinating. You may
discover something unexpected!
ch0136_40_platane/7105_0701_02_10:
What’s important is to go into it without
preconceptions—and be willing to try anything!
ch0136_40_platane/7105_0701_03_10:
I hope you’ll try challenging yourself in a variety
of ways, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0136_40_platane/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a special present, from me to you!
ch0136_40_platane/1701_0702_01_10:
And if you’re a good kid, someone else might give
you presents as well!
ch0136_40_platane/2501_0701_01_10:
In Kalos’s Lumiose City, there’s a mode of
transportation called the Gogoat Shuttle.
ch0136_40_platane/2501_0701_02_10: It helps you get around by riding on a Gogoat!
ch0136_40_platane/2501_0701_03_10:
Pasio’s also a large place, so maybe someday a
Pokémon-powered method of transportation will
crop up here, too!
ch0136_40_platane/2501_0702_01_10: You need to be careful when riding a Gogoat.
ch0136_40_platane/2501_0702_02_10:
They move superfast, so your carefully styled hair
could get all messed up...
ch0136_40_platane/2511_0701_01_10:
I give out Pokédexes and Pokémon to Trainers who
have that special spark of potential.
ch0136_40_platane/2511_0701_02_10:
I suppose you could say that’s a type of present,
right?
ch0136_40_platane/2511_0701_03_10:
After all, meeting a Pokémon you never knew
about before is such a glorious feeling!
ch0136_40_platane/2511_0702_01_10:
When everyone returns from their journeys, they
always give me back more than I ever gave them
to start!
ch0136_40_platane/2511_0702_02_10:
Just seeing how they’ve grown along with their
Pokémon is like a gift. It makes me so happy!
ch0136_40_platane/3001_0701_01_10:
To make today the best it could possibly be,
you ought to spend it together with someone!
ch0136_40_platane/3003_0701_01_10:
Seeing the town so full of life really warms the
heart, doesn’t it.
ch0136_40_platane/3005_0701_01_10:
I think it might be time for bed! I hope your day
tomorrow is just as special as today!
